description: Watermelon&nbsp;Mimosas are a great way to cool down on those hot&nbsp;summer days. They taste delicious and offer many health benefits too!The next time you're feeling overheated, try this stimulating cocktail made with watermelons mixed into orange juice for an invigorating drink that will make your skin look younger than ever before (or just give yourself some happy veins)So next time you're enjoying a drink with friends, why not have one that's good for you too?
name: Watermelon Mimosa
recipeIngredient: 1 quarter Large watermelon (peeled and cut into small pieces)
Sugar or honey to taste, optional
